title: Breadcrumb Navigation Pattern
excerpt: Helping users understand and navigate hierarchical structures.
content:
Breadcrumb navigation is a secondary navigation scheme that reveals the user's location in a website or web application. It provides links back to each previous page the user navigated through to get to the current page.

Types of Breadcrumbs

  • Location-based breadcrumbs
  • Path-based breadcrumbs
  • Attribute-based breadcrumbs

Best Practices

  1. Keep it simple and concise
  2. Use clear separators between levels
  3. Make each level clickable
  4. Consider mobile responsiveness
